name: Elf Race Traits
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Race Traits/Elf Race Traits

sections.body: Having lived outside of traditional elf society for much or all of your life, you know the world can be cruel, dangerous, and unforgiving of the weak. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Fortitude saving throws.
sections.name: Forlorn
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Race Traits/Elf Race Traits/Forlorn

sections.body: As a child, you put in long hours on combat drills, and though time has made this training a dim memory, you still have a knack for quickly responding to trouble. You gain a +2 trait bonus on initiative checks.
sections.name: Warrior of Old
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Race Traits/Elf Race Traits/Warrior of Old
